english.segment1: I am a blind man trying to find the way. A deaf man with my ear to the ground. Just listening for what You say
english.segment2: I've got no voice to sing the songs. Written by the prophets on the subway walls. The kingdom is a golden table and we are beggars all
english.segment3: Are these just some words that I say aloud?. Is this just the sun breaking through the clouds?. Oh, I know it's more and I know somehow that. Heaven is breaking through. And it's You, it's You, it's You, it's You, You
english.segment4: I've wandered deserts looking for a sign. A wild flower in a valley low. Just reaching for the light
english.segment5: I have no place to lay my head, no sanctuary of my own. The kingdom waits with open arms. For pilgrims headed home
english.segment6: Are these just some words that I say aloud?. Is this just the sun breaking through the clouds?. Oh, I know it's more and I know somehow that. Heaven is breaking through. And it's You, it's You, it's You, it's You, it's You
english.segment7: (I am a blind man trying to find the way). I'm looking for. (I am a blind man trying to find the way). Heaven is breaking, heaven is breaking. (I am a blind man trying to find the way). Heaven is breaking through
english.segment8: Heaven is breaking, heaven is breaking. (I am a blind man trying to find the way). Heaven is breaking through. Oh, heaven is breaking, heaven is breaking. (I am a blind man trying to find the way). Heaven is breaking through
english.segment9: Heaven is breaking, heaven is breaking. (I am a blind man trying to find the way). Heaven is breaking through. And it's You, it's You, it's You, it's You, yeah. It's You, it's You, it's You, You
english.segment10: I am a blind man trying to find the way
